response.overview: (Japanese LaserDisc Release)  Come along and join the fun with all your favorite Disney characters in their most outrageous adventures yet! Treat your whole family to the silly antics of Mickey, Donald, Pluto, Goofy and all the gang! If fun and laughter are what you're after, bring home a cartoon classic today and let the good times roll!  Whether Donald's horsing around in Dude Duck, breaking bread with a bear in Grin and Bear It, or trying to silence a noisy neighbor in Trombone Trouble, he always manages to ruffle a few feathers! From sidesplitting start to fun-filled finale, you'll find this collection of Donald cartoons is terrific!  The complete program of cartoons Starring Donald! include: Bee at the Beach, Grin and Bear It, Donald's Double Trouble, Bootle Beetle, Dude Duck, Trombone Trouble, Hooked Bear.
response.tagline: Come along and join the fun with all your favorite Disney characters in their most outrageous adventures yet!
response.title: Starring Donald
